<body class="mediawiki ltr sitedir-ltr ns-0 ns-subject page-Sunny_Leone skin-vector action-view vector-animateLayout">
		<div id="mw-page-base" class="noprint"></div>
		<div id="mw-head-base" class="noprint"></div>
		<div id="content" class="mw-body" role="main">
			<a id="top"></a>
			<div id="mw-js-message" style="display:none;"></div>
						<h1 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading" lang="en"><span dir="auto">Sunny Leone</span></h1>
			<div id="bodyContent">
								<div id="siteSub">From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia</div>
								<div id="contentSub"></div>
												<div id="jump-to-nav" class="mw-jump">
					Jump to:					<a href="#mw-navigation">navigation</a>, 					<a href="#p-search">search</a>
				</div>
				<div id="mw-content-text" lang="en" dir="ltr" class="mw-content-ltr"><p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Distinguish2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Distinguish2 (page does not exist)">Template:Distinguish2</a>
<a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Use_mdy_dates&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Use mdy dates (page does not exist)">Template:Use mdy dates</a>
<a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Pp-semi-protected&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Pp-semi-protected (page does not exist)">Template:Pp-semi-protected</a>
<a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Infobox_adult_biography&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Infobox adult biography (page does not exist)">Template:Infobox adult biography</a>
</p><p><b>Sunny Leone</b> (born <b>Karenjit Kaur Vohra</b>; May 13, 1981)<sup id="cite_ref-OwnBio_1-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OwnBio-1">[1]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-2">[2]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-3">[3]</a></sup> is a Canadian actress, businesswoman, model and former <a href="/wiki/Pornographic_actress" title="Pornographic actress" class="mw-redirect">pornographic actress</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4">[4]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-5">[5]</a></sup> She was named <a href="/wiki/Penthouse_(magazine)" title="Penthouse (magazine)"><i>Penthouse</i></a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=List_of_Penthouse_Pets_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="List of Penthouse Pets of the Year (page does not exist)">Pet of the Year</a> in 2003 and was a contract star for <a href="/wiki/Vivid_Entertainment" title="Vivid Entertainment">Vivid Entertainment</a>. Named by <i><a href="/wiki/Maxim_(magazine)" title="Maxim (magazine)">Maxim</a></i> as one of the 12 top porn stars in 2010, she has also played roles in independent mainstream films and television shows. She further made her <a href="/wiki/Bollywood" title="Bollywood">Bollywood</a> debut in <a href="/wiki/Pooja_Bhatt" title="Pooja Bhatt">Pooja Bhatt</a>'s commercially successful <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Jism_2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jism 2 (page does not exist)">Jism 2</a></i> (2012) and also acted in <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Jackpot_(2013_film)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jackpot (2013 film) (page does not exist)">Jackpot</a></i> (2013), <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Ragini_MMS_2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ragini MMS 2 (page does not exist)">Ragini MMS 2</a></i> (2014) and <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Tina_and_Lolo&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Tina and Lolo (page does not exist)">Tina and Lolo</a></i> (2014).
</p>
<div id="toc" class="toc"><div id="toctitle"><h2>Contents</h2></div>

</ul>
</div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Early_life">Early life</span></h2>
<p>Leone was born in <a href="/wiki/Sarnia" title="Sarnia">Sarnia</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ontario" title="Ontario">Ontario</a> to Sikh <a href="/wiki/Punjabi_people" title="Punjabi people">Punjabi</a> parents.<sup id="cite_ref-eyeweek_6-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eyeweek-6">[6]</a></sup> Her father was born in <a href="/wiki/Tibet" title="Tibet">Tibet</a> and raised in <a href="/wiki/Delhi" title="Delhi">Delhi</a>, while her mother (who died in 2008)<sup id="cite_ref-mompass_7-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-mompass-7">[7]</a></sup> was from <a href="/wiki/Sirmaur_district" title="Sirmaur district">Sirmaur, Himachal Pradesh</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-eyeweek_6-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eyeweek-6">[6]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Lukeisback.com_8-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Lukeisback.com-8">[8]</a></sup> As a young girl, she was very athletic and played street hockey with the boys,<sup id="cite_ref-avn_9-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-avn-9">[9]</a></sup> and ice skating on a nearby frozen lake.<sup id="cite_ref-rabbit_10-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-rabbit-10">[10]</a></sup>
</p><p>Although the family was <a href="/wiki/Sikh" title="Sikh">Sikh</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-eyeweek_6-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eyeweek-6">[6]</a></sup> her parents enrolled her in Catholic school<sup id="cite_ref-eyeweek_6-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eyeweek-6">[6]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-Ambush_11-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Ambush-11">[11]</a></sup> as it was felt to be unsafe for her to go to public school.<sup id="cite_ref-Alff_12-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Alff-12">[12]</a></sup> There she had her first kiss at 11, lost her virginity to a basketball player at another school at 16,<sup id="cite_ref-Ambush_11-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Ambush-11">[11]</a></sup> and discovered her <a href="/w/index.php?title=Bisexuality&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Bisexuality (page does not exist)">bisexuality</a> at age 18.<sup id="cite_ref-bisexual_13-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-bisexual-13">[13]</a></sup> When she was 13, her family moved to <a href="/w/index.php?title=Fort_Gratiot&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Fort Gratiot (page does not exist)">Fort Gratiot</a>, <a href="/wiki/Michigan" title="Michigan">Michigan</a>, then to <a href="/wiki/Lake_Forest,_California" title="Lake Forest, California">Lake Forest, California</a> a year later,<sup id="cite_ref-Ambush_11-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Ambush-11">[11]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-torostar_14-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-torostar-14">[14]</a></sup> fulfilling her grandparents' dream that the family be together in one place.<sup id="cite_ref-eyeweek_6-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eyeweek-6">[6]</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Career">Career</span></h2>
<p>Before working in the porn industry, she first worked at a German bakery,<sup id="cite_ref-xrent_15-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-xrent-15">[15]</a></sup> a <a href="/w/index.php?title=Jiffy_Lube&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jiffy Lube (page does not exist)">Jiffy Lube</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-Ambush_11-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Ambush-11">[11]</a></sup> and later a tax and retirement firm.<sup id="cite_ref-freeones.com_16-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-freeones.com-16">[16]</a></sup>
</p>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:132px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Sunny_Leone_r140014.png" title="File:Sunny Leone r140014.png">File:Sunny Leone r140014.png</a>  <div class="thumbcaption">Leone at the 2002 Adult Entertainment Expo, one of her earliest promotional appearances</div></div></div>
<p>While studying to be a <a href="/wiki/Pediatrics" title="Pediatrics">pediatric</a> nurse in <a href="/wiki/Orange_County,_California" title="Orange County, California">Orange County</a>, a classmate who was an <a href="/wiki/Exotic_dancer" title="Exotic dancer">exotic dancer</a> introduced Leone to John Stevens, an agent who in turn introduced her to Jay Allen, a photographer for <i><a href="/wiki/Penthouse_(magazine)" title="Penthouse (magazine)">Penthouse</a></i> magazine.<sup id="cite_ref-Lukeisback.com_8-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Lukeisback.com-8">[8]</a></sup> When picking a name for her adult career, she has said that Sunny is her real name and Leone was picked by <a href="/wiki/Bob_Guccione" title="Bob Guccione">Bob Guccione</a>, former owner of <i>Penthouse</i> magazine.<sup id="cite_ref-adultfilm_17-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-adultfilm-17">[17]</a></sup> She posed for <i>Penthouse</i> magazine, and was named <i>Penthouse</i> Pet of the Month for the March 2001 issue, followed by a feature in the Holiday 2001 edition of <i><a href="/wiki/Hustler" title="Hustler">Hustler</a></i> magazine as a Hustler Honey. She has also appeared in other magazines including <i>Cheri</i>,<sup id="cite_ref-Cheri_18-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Cheri-18">[18]</a></sup> <i> Mystique Magazine</i>,<sup id="cite_ref-mystique_19-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-mystique-19">[19]</a></sup> <i><a href="/wiki/High_Society_(magazine)" title="High Society (magazine)">High Society</a></i>, <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Swank&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Swank (page does not exist)">Swank</a></i>, <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=AVN_(magazine)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="AVN (magazine) (page does not exist)">AVN Online</a></i>, <i>Leg World</i>, <i><a href="/wiki/Club_International" title="Club International">Club International</a></i> and <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Lowrider_Magazine&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Lowrider Magazine (page does not exist)">Lowrider</a></i>,<sup id="cite_ref-lowrider1_20-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-lowrider1-20">[20]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-lowrider2_21-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-lowrider2-21">[21]</a></sup> while her online credits include ModFX Models,<sup id="cite_ref-modfxmodels_22-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-modfxmodels-22">[22]</a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Suze_Randall" title="Suze Randall">Suze Randall</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-suze.net_23-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-suze.net-23">[23]</a></sup> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ken_Marcus&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ken Marcus (page does not exist)">Ken Marcus</a><sup id="cite_ref-kenmarcus_24-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-kenmarcus-24">[24]</a></sup> and Mac &amp; Bumble.<sup id="cite_ref-macbumble.com_25-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-macbumble.com-25">[25]</a></sup> Her pictorial credits also include working with stars like <a href="/wiki/Adriana_Sage" title="Adriana Sage">Adriana Sage</a>, <a href="/wiki/Jenna_Jameson" title="Jenna Jameson">Jenna Jameson</a>, <a href="/w/index.php?title=Jelena_Jensen&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jelena Jensen (page does not exist)">Jelena Jensen</a> and <a href="/w/index.php?title=Aria_Giovanni&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Aria Giovanni (page does not exist)">Aria Giovanni</a>.
</p><p>In 2003, she was named "Penthouse Pet of the Year" and starred in the video <i>Penthouse Pets in Paradise</i> alongside <a href="/wiki/Tera_Patrick" title="Tera Patrick">Tera Patrick</a> and <a href="/wiki/Kyla_Cole" title="Kyla Cole">Kyla Cole</a>. In 2005 <a href="/w/index.php?title=Adam_%26_Eve_(business)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Adam &amp; Eve (business) (page does not exist)">Adam &amp; Eve</a> appointed her as their West Coast Internet Sales Representative.<sup id="cite_ref-adameve_26-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-adameve-26">[26]</a></sup>
</p><p>That same year, Leone signed a three-year contract with <a href="/wiki/Vivid_Entertainment" title="Vivid Entertainment">Vivid Entertainment</a> with which she transitioned into the world of hardcore pornography, stating that she would only do lesbian scenes.<sup id="cite_ref-avn_9-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-avn-9">[9]</a></sup> Her first movie released was titled <i>Sunny</i><sup id="cite_ref-27" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-27">[27]</a></sup> and was released in December 2005. Her next movie, <i>Virtual Vivid Girl Sunny Leone</i>, was the first interactive title for Leone, who was the first Vivid Girl to make such a movie.<sup id="cite_ref-vvivid_28-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-vvivid-28">[28]</a></sup> Taking only four days to film,<sup id="cite_ref-xrent_15-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-xrent-15">[15]</a></sup> the movie won her her first <a href="/wiki/AVN_Award" title="AVN Award">AVN Award</a> (Best Interactive DVD). She followed this with <i>Sunny Loves Cher</i>, which featured her first on-screen <a href="/wiki/Female_ejaculation" title="Female ejaculation">squirting</a>, and <i>The Female Gardner</i> co-starring <a href="/w/index.php?title=Mikayla_Mendez&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Mikayla Mendez (page does not exist)">Mikayla Mendez</a> and <a href="/w/index.php?title=Daisy_Marie&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Daisy Marie (page does not exist)">Daisy Marie</a>.
</p><p>Leone's last two movies under her contract with Vivid were <i>It's Sunny in Brazil</i>, which was filmed in <a href="/wiki/Brazil" title="Brazil">Brazil</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-Brazil_29-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Brazil-29">[29]</a></sup> and <i>The Sunny Experiment</i> also starring <a href="/w/index.php?title=Monique_Alexander&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Monique Alexander (page does not exist)">Monique Alexander</a> and  Brea Lynn.<sup id="cite_ref-experiment_30-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-experiment-30">[30]</a></sup> The movies were released in October and December 2007 respectively.
</p><p>In May 2007, upon re-signing her contract with Vivid for another six films, Leone agreed to perform for the first time with men on camera, but exclusively with her fiancé, Matt Erikson.<sup id="cite_ref-31" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-31">[31]</a></sup> That summer she also received <a href="/w/index.php?title=Breast_implant&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Breast implant (page does not exist)">breast augmentation</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-onset_32-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-onset-32">[32]</a></sup> and shot her first movie under the new contract titled <i>Sunny Loves Matt</i>. The movie led to her to be nominated for three (out of six) AVN awards in 2009 in addition to being a choice for Female Performer of the Year.<sup id="cite_ref-awards09_33-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-awards09-33">[33]</a></sup> She followed up her first boy-girl title with <i>The Other Side of Sunny</i> in October 2008, which would be the last time she would perform with Erikson.
</p>
<div class="thumb tleft"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:132px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Sunny_Leone_at_AEE2008_cropped.jpg" title="File:Sunny Leone at AEE2008 cropped.jpg">File:Sunny Leone at AEE2008 cropped.jpg</a>  <div class="thumbcaption">Leone at Vivid booth during the 2008 <a href="/w/index.php?title=AVN_Adult_Entertainment_Expo&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="AVN Adult Entertainment Expo (page does not exist)">AVN Adult Entertainment Expo</a> in <a href="/wiki/Las_Vegas_Valley" title="Las Vegas Valley">Las Vegas</a></div></div></div>
<p>In January 2008, Leone revealed that she was no longer exclusive to Erikson, and had done scenes with other actors, most notably <a href="/w/index.php?title=Tommy_Gunn_(porn_actor)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Tommy Gunn (porn actor) (page does not exist)">Tommy Gunn</a>, Charles Dera, <a href="/w/index.php?title=James_Deen&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="James Deen (page does not exist)">James Deen</a><sup id="cite_ref-sunlust_34-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-sunlust-34">[34]</a></sup> and <a href="/w/index.php?title=Voodoo_(pornographic_actor)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Voodoo (pornographic actor) (page does not exist)">Voodoo</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-Tommygunn_35-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Tommygunn-35">[35]</a></sup> 
In 2009, Vivid released her only movie performing with other male actors titled "<i>Sunny B/G Adventure</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-bgadventure_36-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-bgadventure-36">[36]</a></sup> Her final release under contract with Vivid – "<i>Undress Me</i>", once again made her exclusive to performing with just one male actor-Daniel Webber.<sup id="cite_ref-undress_37-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-undress-37">[37]</a></sup>
</p><p>In August 2009, she announced the launch of her own studio, Sunlust Pictures, with Daniel Weber as her partner.<sup id="cite_ref-sunlustpartner_38-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-sunlustpartner-38">[38]</a></sup> With her new venture Leone plans to write, direct and create her own brand of adult movies with Vivid Entertainment as her distributor.<sup id="cite_ref-sunlust_34-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-sunlust-34">[34]</a></sup> Her first independent production, <i>The Dark Side of the Sun</i>, was released in March 2009, and was debuted at the Erotic Heritage Museum in <a href="/wiki/Las_Vegas_Valley" title="Las Vegas Valley">Las Vegas</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-darksun_39-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-darksun-39">[39]</a></sup> In June 2009, she held a casting call in Las Vegas for her second independent production titled <i>Sunny Slumber Party</i><sup id="cite_ref-slumber_40-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-slumber-40">[40]</a></sup> (released September 2009).She followed up with three  other self produced features <i>Gia  Portrait of a Porn Star</i> (2010) which was nominated for multiple AVN awards,<sup id="cite_ref-gia_41-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-gia-41">[41]</a></sup> <i>Roleplay</i> (2011) and <i>Goddess</i> (2012) which featured her first <a href="/wiki/Anal_sex" title="Anal sex">anal sex</a> scene.<sup id="cite_ref-goddess_42-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-goddess-42">[42]</a></sup>
</p><p>No longer exclusive to Vivid, Leone has started working with other studios and performers since 2009. She has managed to leverage her online popularity by striking deals with firms like PPPcard,<sup id="cite_ref-PPPcard_43-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PPPcard-43">[43]</a></sup> AdultPokerParty.com,<sup id="cite_ref-pokerparty_44-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pokerparty-44">[44]</a></sup> Brickhouse,<sup id="cite_ref-brickhouse_45-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-brickhouse-45">[45]</a></sup> Flirt4Free,<sup id="cite_ref-flirt_46-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-flirt-46">[46]</a></sup> Totemcash<sup id="cite_ref-totem_47-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-totem-47">[47]</a></sup> and Imlive<sup id="cite_ref-imlive_48-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-imlive-48">[48]</a></sup> to sell and distribute her content over the internet and other media. She won the "Web Babe of the Year" at the 2008 <a href="/w/index.php?title=XBIZ_Award&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="XBIZ Award (page does not exist)">Xbiz Awards</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-xbizaward_49-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-xbizaward-49">[49]</a></sup> Her websites and business interests are run under her banner company Leone L.L.C. She indicated in an April 2012 interview that 80 per cent of the traffic on her website, and 60 per cent of her revenue comes from India.<sup id="cite_ref-50" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-50">[50]</a></sup>
</p><p>In addition to her film career, Leone has been part of the Vivid Comedy Tour,<sup id="cite_ref-comedynite_51-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-comedynite-51">[51]</a></sup> and has modelled for the Vivid Footwear collection.<sup id="cite_ref-shoes_52-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-shoes-52">[52]</a></sup> Leone has also participated in events like the Vivid/<a href="/w/index.php?title=ClubJenna&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="ClubJenna (page does not exist)">ClubJenna</a> <a href="/wiki/Legends_Cup_(LFL)" title="Legends Cup (LFL)">Lingerie Bowl</a><sup id="cite_ref-clubjenna_53-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-clubjenna-53">[53]</a></sup> and Vivid's Hot Rod Night.<sup id="cite_ref-hotrodnight_54-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-hotrodnight-54">[54]</a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Reuben_Sturman" title="Reuben Sturman">Doc Johnson</a> launched a <a href="/wiki/Sex_toy#Penile_toys" title="Sex toy">pocket pal</a> in 2006 moulded to her <a href="/wiki/Vagina" title="Vagina">vagina</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-johnson_55-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-johnson-55">[55]</a></sup> and in 2008 released the Sunny Leone Exciter vibrator.<sup id="cite_ref-vibrator_56-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-vibrator-56">[56]</a></sup> Control MFG currently uses Leone's image along with other Vivid girls to market their line of skateboards. She is paired with Gab Ekoe, one of the Team Control riders.<sup id="cite_ref-skateboard_57-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-skateboard-57">[57]</a></sup> She also indicated that she plans to launch her own line of lingerie and other Sunny-branded products including a diamond jewellery line.<sup id="cite_ref-sunlust_34-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-sunlust-34">[34]</a></sup>
</p><p>In September 2009, an <a href="/w/index.php?title=IPhone&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="IPhone (page does not exist)">iPhone</a> application consisting of a collection of non-nude photos, some videos and a porn star-penned blog<sup id="cite_ref-iPhoneInfoworld_58-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-iPhoneInfoworld-58">[58]</a></sup> was approved by <a href="/wiki/Apple_Inc." title="Apple Inc.">Apple</a> for sale in the iTunes store, making it the first officially sanctioned application featuring a porn star.<sup id="cite_ref-iPhonePressRelease_59-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-iPhonePressRelease-59">[59]</a></sup> By February 2010, the app had been removed by Apple from the store.<sup id="cite_ref-60" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-60">[60]</a></sup>
</p><p>Leone was voted number 13 (up from number 41 in 2007<sup id="cite_ref-gen07_61-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-gen07-61">[61]</a></sup>) on <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Genesis_(magazine)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Genesis (magazine) (page does not exist)">Genesis</a></i> magazine's "Top 100 Porn stars" list,<sup id="cite_ref-genesis_62-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-genesis-62">[62]</a></sup> number 34 on Desiclubs.com's Top 50 Coolest Desis of 2004,<sup id="cite_ref-50desi_63-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-50desi-63">[63]</a></sup> and one of the "40 under 40" ranking on <i>AVN Online</i> magazine.<sup id="cite_ref-4040AVN_64-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-4040AVN-64">[64]</a></sup> In 2010, she was named by <a href="/wiki/Maxim_(magazine)" title="Maxim (magazine)"><i>Maxim</i></a> as one of the 12 top female stars in porn.<sup id="cite_ref-MaxinTop10_65-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MaxinTop10-65">[65]</a></sup> She was voted number 82 in the Top 99 Women for 2012 in <a href="/w/index.php?title=AskMen&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="AskMen (page does not exist)">AskMen</a>.com's list.<sup id="cite_ref-Askmen2012_66-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Askmen2012-66">[66]</a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Mainstream_appearances">Mainstream appearances</span></h3>
<p>Leone's first mainstream appearance was in 2005, when she was a red carpet reporter for the <a href="/w/index.php?title=MTV_Video_Music_Awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="MTV Video Music Awards (page does not exist)">MTV Awards</a> on <a href="/w/index.php?title=MTV_India&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="MTV India (page does not exist)">MTV India</a>. She has also had a cameo in the film <i><a href="/wiki/The_Girl_Next_Door_(2004_film)" title="The Girl Next Door (2004 film)">The Girl Next Door</a></i>, performed in <a href="/wiki/Ja_Rule" title="Ja Rule">Ja Rule</a>'s video <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Livin%27_It_Up_(Ja_Rule_song)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Livin' It Up (Ja Rule song) (page does not exist)">Livin' It Up</a></i> and a video for Kidd Skilly.<sup id="cite_ref-skilly_67-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-skilly-67">[67]</a></sup> Other credits include <a href="/wiki/E!" title="E!">E!</a>'s "Wild On!" and the Sundance Film Festival's 'After Dark'.<sup id="cite_ref-profile_68-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-profile-68">[68]</a></sup> Leone was a contestant in the second season of the Fox reality show <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=My_Bare_Lady&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="My Bare Lady (page does not exist)">My Bare Lady 2: Open for Business</a></i>, in which a group of adult actresses were given classes and training on how to pitch investment ideas and competed for success in the business world.<sup id="cite_ref-fox_69-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-fox-69">[69]</a></sup> In addition to filming her scene for <i>Debbie Does Dallas</i> in 2007, Leone was also part of a <a href="/wiki/Showtime_(TV_network)" title="Showtime (TV network)">Showtime</a> documentary of the same name detailing the production of the movie and the personal lives of its stars.
</p><p>She has indicated that for the right price she would seriously consider a career in <a href="/wiki/Bollywood" title="Bollywood">Bollywood</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-steami_70-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-steami-70">[70]</a></sup> She has been courted by Indian directors in the past but has felt uncomfortable with the roles that she would have played.<sup id="cite_ref-adultfilm_17-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-adultfilm-17">[17]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-royal_71-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-royal-71">[71]</a></sup> Director <a href="/w/index.php?title=Mohit_Suri&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Mohit Suri (page does not exist)">Mohit Suri</a> reportedly asked Leone to play the lead role in his film <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Kalyug_(2005_film)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Kalyug (2005 film) (page does not exist)">Kalyug</a></i>, but instead cast <a href="/w/index.php?title=Deepal_Shaw&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Deepal Shaw (page does not exist)">Deepal Shaw</a> as he could not afford Leone's $1&#160;million acting fee.<sup id="cite_ref-Kalyug_72-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Kalyug-72">[72]</a></sup> She has mentioned that <a href="/wiki/Aamir_Khan" title="Aamir Khan">Aamir Khan</a> is her favorite Bollywood actor,<sup id="cite_ref-curry_73-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-curry-73">[73]</a></sup> and that over 60% of her fans are from South Asia.<sup id="cite_ref-74" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-74">[74]</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2008, Leone announced that she would be starring in a mainstream action adventure movie titled <i>Pirates Blood</i>, which was shot in <a href="/wiki/Oman" title="Oman">Oman</a>. The shooting was completed in two weeks and was to be released in winter 2008.<sup id="cite_ref-oman_75-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-oman-75">[75]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pirblood_76-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pirblood-76">[76]</a></sup> Leone also landed a role in <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Middle_Men_(film)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Middle Men (film) (page does not exist)">Middle Men</a></i>, producer Chris Mallick's indie feature about the birth of the online porn industry set for wide theatrical release in 2009.<sup id="cite_ref-middlemen_77-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-middlemen-77">[77]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-iesb_78-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-iesb-78">[78]</a></sup>
</p><p>She appeared in the film <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Virginity_Hit&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Virginity Hit (page does not exist)">The Virginity Hit</a></i> playing a version of herself, where she is hired to take the virginity of the lead character.<sup id="cite_ref-79" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-79">[79]</a></sup>
</p><p>Leone has made appearances at events such as the 2002 <a href="/wiki/SEMA" title="SEMA">SEMA</a> International Auto Salon, the 2002 Extreme Autofest Pomona and the 2006 <a href="/wiki/World_Series_of_Poker" title="World Series of Poker">World Series of Poker</a> in Las Vegas.<sup id="cite_ref-wsop_80-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-wsop-80">[80]</a></sup> Sunny has also been the hostess at events in clubs like the Mansion in Miami<sup id="cite_ref-miami_81-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-miami-81">[81]</a></sup> and the Highlands in Hollywood.<sup id="cite_ref-highland_82-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-highland-82">[82]</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2005, she was mentioned in <i><a href="/wiki/Forbes" title="Forbes">Forbes</a></i> magazine for a story on Vivid Entertainment.<sup id="cite_ref-forbes_83-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-forbes-83">[83]</a></sup> Leone has also been featured in mainstream publications like <i><a href="/wiki/FHM" title="FHM">FHM</a></i>, <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Front_(magazine)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Front (magazine) (page does not exist)">Front</a></i> and <i><a href="/wiki/Jane_(magazine)" title="Jane (magazine)">Jane</a></i> magazine.<sup id="cite_ref-versatile_84-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-versatile-84">[84]</a></sup> In 2007, along with the other Vivid Girls, she was seen in a 48' high holiday Billboard in <a href="/wiki/Times_Square" title="Times Square">Times Square</a> at W. 48th Street and <a href="/wiki/Seventh_Avenue_(Manhattan)" title="Seventh Avenue (Manhattan)">Seventh Avenue</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-billboard_85-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-billboard-85">[85]</a></sup> Leone is also one of the <i>Penthouse</i> Pets who appears in the <a href="/wiki/PlayStation_Portable" title="PlayStation Portable">PlayStation Portable</a> game <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Pocket_Pool&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Pocket Pool (page does not exist)">Pocket Pool</a></i>. She was also featured in a <a href="/wiki/Coffee_table_book" title="Coffee table book">coffee table book</a> titled <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Naked_Ambition:_An_R_Rated_Look_at_an_X_Rated_Industry&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Naked Ambition: An R Rated Look at an X Rated Industry (page does not exist)">Naked Ambition: An R Rated Look at an X Rated Industry</a></i> by Michael Grecco.<sup id="cite_ref-book_86-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-book-86">[86]</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2004, she was part of "No More Bush Girls", in which she and several other popular adult actresses shaved off their <a href="/wiki/Pubic_hair" title="Pubic hair">pubic hair</a> in protest of the Bush presidency.<sup id="cite_ref-shave_87-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-shave-87">[87]</a></sup> In May 2008, she shot a promotional video for <a href="/wiki/Declare_Yourself" title="Declare Yourself">Declare Yourself</a>, a nonprofit, nonpartisan voter registration campaign targeting 18-to-29-year-olds.<sup id="cite_ref-votepsa_88-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-votepsa-88">[88]</a></sup> She indicated that <a href="/wiki/Barack_Obama" title="Barack Obama">Barack Obama</a> would be her choice in the 2008 U.S. election, primarily because she felt he was more business friendly to the adult industry than his opponent <a href="/wiki/John_McCain" title="John McCain">John McCain</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-elect_89-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-elect-89">[89]</a></sup> She also released a public service announcement on behalf of the ASACP, reminding adult webmasters to protect their sites from children by having an RTA label on it.<sup id="cite_ref-rta_90-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-rta-90">[90]</a></sup>
</p><p>Leone has a strong interest in health and fitness, and has been featured in several mainstream fitness publications. Leone has modelled fitness clothing for the sports brand Fantasy Fitness<sup id="cite_ref-91" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-91">[91]</a></sup> and shared that she keeps her body in shape by working out as much as she can despite her busy schedule and as quoted in <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Men%27s_Fitness&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Men's Fitness (page does not exist)">Men's Fitness</a></i> magazine, "I try to eat very healthy&#160;– lots of vegetables, drinking my milk every day."<sup id="cite_ref-92" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-92">[92]</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2013, Leone posed for a <a href="/wiki/People_for_the_Ethical_Treatment_of_Animals" title="People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals">PETA</a> ad campaign, encouraging dog and cat owners to have their pets spayed and neutered.<sup id="cite_ref-93" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-93">[93]</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Bigg_Boss"><i>Bigg Boss</i></span></h4>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:182px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Sunny_Leone_at_Bigg_Boss_series,_India_(2).jpg" title="File:Sunny Leone at Bigg Boss series, India (2).jpg">File:Sunny Leone at Bigg Boss series, India (2).jpg</a>  <div class="thumbcaption">Leone with show host <a href="/wiki/Sanjay_Dutt" title="Sanjay Dutt">Sanjay Dutt</a> after her eviction from the <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Bigg_Boss_(season_5)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Bigg Boss (season 5) (page does not exist)">Bigg Boss</a></i> house</div></div></div>
<p>In 2011, she participated in the Indian reality series <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Bigg_Boss_(season_5)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Bigg Boss (season 5) (page does not exist)">Bigg Boss</a></i>, entering the house on day 49.<sup id="cite_ref-94" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-94">[94]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-95" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-95">[95]</a></sup> However she refused to divulge her porn star status, and replied to fellow house-mate <a href="/w/index.php?title=Pooja_Bedi&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Pooja Bedi (page does not exist)">Pooja Bedi</a> that she was a model and a TV star in America for the last ten years or so.<sup id="cite_ref-96" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-96">[96]</a></sup> It was reported that she has caused a stir in the larger populace<sup id="cite_ref-97" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-97">[97]</a></sup> with her Twitter feed gaining 8,000 new followers in just 2 days<sup id="cite_ref-98" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-98">[98]</a></sup> and <a href="/wiki/Google" title="Google">Google</a> saying searches for her experienced a "breakout".<sup id="cite_ref-99" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-99">[99]</a></sup> There have also been complaints lodged with the Indian <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ministry_of_Information_and_Broadcasting_(India)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ministry of Information and Broadcasting (India) (page does not exist)">Ministry of Information and Broadcasting</a> alleging that the <a href="/w/index.php?title=Colors_(TV_channel)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Colors (TV channel) (page does not exist)">Colors</a> TV channel is promoting pornography by having Leone appear on the show; among those who have filed are the Indian Artistes and Actors Forum<sup id="cite_ref-100" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-100">[100]</a></sup> and <a href="/w/index.php?title=Anurag_Thakur&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Anurag Thakur (page does not exist)">Anurag Thakur</a>, member of <a href="/wiki/Lok_Sabha" title="Lok Sabha">Lok Sabha</a> and head of the <a href="/wiki/Bharatiya_Janata_Party" title="Bharatiya Janata Party">Bharatiya Janata Party</a>'s youth wing.<sup id="cite_ref-101" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-101">[101]</a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Indian_cinema">Indian cinema</span></h4>
<p>During her stay in the <i>Bigg Boss</i> house, Sunny was approached by <a href="/wiki/Bollywood" title="Bollywood">Bollywood</a> film-maker <a href="/wiki/Mahesh_Bhatt" title="Mahesh Bhatt">Mahesh Bhatt</a> who entered the house briefly to offer her the lead role in <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Jism_2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jism 2 (page does not exist)">Jism 2</a></i> (the sequel to the 2003 film <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Jism_(2003_film)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jism (2003 film) (page does not exist)">Jism</a></i>). She accepted it, which resulted in <a href="/wiki/Pooja_Bhatt" title="Pooja Bhatt">Pooja Bhatt</a>'s production house, Fish Eye Network and Leone's agent discussing the movie further.<sup id="cite_ref-102" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-102">[102]</a></sup> The first look of the film <i>Jism 2</i> poster was released anticipating the actress entry in Bollywood.<sup id="cite_ref-103" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-103">[103]</a></sup> <i>Jism 2</i> was released on August 3, 2012, to poor critical and audience reception.
</p><p>Sunny Leone signed her second <a href="/wiki/Bollywood" title="Bollywood">Bollywood</a> film which is <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ekta_Kapoor&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ekta Kapoor (page does not exist)">Ekta Kapoor</a>'s <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Ragini_MMS&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ragini MMS (page does not exist)">Ragini MMS</a></i> sequel. <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Ragini_MMS&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ragini MMS (page does not exist)">Ragini MMS</a></i>, a crossover horror movie was one of the most talked about sleeper hits of 2011.<sup id="cite_ref-104" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-104">[104]</a></sup> Sunny Leone featured in an <a href="/wiki/Item_number" title="Item number">item number</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Sanjay_Gupta" title="Sanjay Gupta">Sanjay Gupta</a> and <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ekta_Kapoor&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Ekta Kapoor (page does not exist)">Ekta Kapoor</a>'s 2013 film <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Shootout_at_Wadala&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Shootout at Wadala (page does not exist)">Shootout at Wadala</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-105" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-105">[105]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-106" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-106">[106]</a></sup> She further started filming for Kaizad Gustad's <i>Jackpot</i> in which she plays a <a href="/wiki/Femme_fatale" title="Femme fatale">femme fatale</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-107" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-107">[107]</a></sup> <i>Jackpot</i> released on 13 December 2013 and was panned by critics but Leone was praised for her performance. <a href="/w/index.php?title=Taran_Adarsh&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Taran Adarsh (page does not exist)">Taran Adarsh</a> wrote, "Sunny also shows a marked improvement in her performance."<sup id="cite_ref-108" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-108">[108]</a></sup> A review from <i>Bollywood Life</i> compared her to <a href="/w/index.php?title=Katrina_Kaif&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Katrina Kaif (page does not exist)">Katrina Kaif</a> and opined,"Sunny Leone reminds us of Katrina Kaif only a decade ago, but an aged version. Ms Leone would fare better than the superstar as far as the expressions and dialogue delivery departments are concerned even today. "<sup id="cite_ref-109" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-109">[109]</a></sup>
</p><p>She is playing lead along with <a href="/w/index.php?title=Karishma_Tanna&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Karishma Tanna (page does not exist)">Karishma Tanna</a> in new action thriller Tina and Lolo.<sup id="cite_ref-110" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-110">[110]</a></sup> In November 2013, she confirmed that she would make her Tamil film debut in <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Vadacurry&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Vadacurry (page does not exist)">Vadacurry</a></i> in which she would dance for one song.<sup id="cite_ref-111" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-111">[111]</a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personal_life">Personal life</span></h2>
<p>In June 2006, Leone became an American citizen,<sup id="cite_ref-xrent_15-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-xrent-15">[15]</a></sup> but plans to remain a dual citizen of Canada.<sup id="cite_ref-sapna_112-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-sapna-112">[112]</a></sup> On 14 April 2012, Leone announced that she was now a resident of India.<sup id="cite_ref-113" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-113">[113]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-in.movies.yahoo.com_114-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-in.movies.yahoo.com-114">[114]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-in.movies.yahoo.com_114-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-in.movies.yahoo.com-114">[114]</a></sup> explaining in an interview to <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=The_New_Indian_Express&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The New Indian Express (page does not exist)">The New Indian Express</a></i> that she was an <a href="/w/index.php?title=Overseas_Citizen_of_India&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Overseas Citizen of India (page does not exist)">Overseas Citizen of India</a> and that she was eligible for overseas citizenship because her parents lived in <a href="/wiki/India" title="India">India</a>. She applied for it prior to filming <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Jism_2&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Jism 2 (page does not exist)">Jism 2</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-115" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-115">[115]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-116" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-116">[116]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-117" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-117">[117]</a></sup>
</p>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:182px;"><a href="/wiki/File:Sunny_Leone,Daniel_comes_to_India_to_promote_%27Jism_-_2%27_03.jpg" title="File:Sunny Leone,Daniel comes to India to promote 'Jism - 2' 03.jpg">File:Sunny Leone,Daniel comes to India to promote 'Jism - 2' 03.jpg</a>  <div class="thumbcaption">Sunny Leone and husband Daniel Weber arriving in India to promote <i>Jism 2</i></div></div></div>
<p>Although bisexual, she has stated that she prefers men.<sup id="cite_ref-118" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-118">[118]</a></sup> Leone was engaged to Matt Erikson, a vice-president of marketing at <a href="/wiki/Playboy_Enterprises" title="Playboy Enterprises">Playboy Enterprises</a> but they broke up in 2008.<sup id="cite_ref-torostar_14-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-torostar-14">[14]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-119" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-119">[119]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-120" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-120">[120]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-121" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-121">[121]</a></sup> Sunny Leone had dated stand-up comedian <a href="/wiki/Russell_Peters" title="Russell Peters">Russell Peters</a> for a brief period in 2008.<sup id="cite_ref-122" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-122">[122]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-123" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-123">[123]</a></sup> She mentioned in an interview at the start of 2011 that she was married to Daniel Weber.<sup id="cite_ref-124" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-124">[124]</a></sup> During her stay in the <i>Bigg Boss</i> house later that same year, Leone indicated that she had married; Leone said she 'purposely arrived late' to their first date as she was not impressed with him, but he changed her mind by sending 24 roses to her hotel room.<sup id="cite_ref-125" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-125">[125]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-126" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-126">[126]</a></sup> She currently resides in <a href="/wiki/Hollywood" title="Hollywood">Hollywood, California</a> with her cat and drives an <a href="/wiki/Audi_A5" title="Audi A5">Audi A5</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-Ambush_11-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Ambush-11">[11]</a></sup>
</p><p>In 2010, Leone's father died of cancer, which he had been first diagnosed with in 1999. In 2011, Leone along with <a href="/w/index.php?title=Monique_Alexander&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Monique Alexander (page does not exist)">Monique Alexander</a> and Keni Styles ran in the <a href="/w/index.php?title=Rock_%27n%27_Roll_Marathon_Series&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Rock 'n' Roll Marathon Series (page does not exist)">Rock 'n' Roll Los Angeles Half-Marathon</a> to raise money for the <a href="/wiki/American_Cancer_Society" title="American Cancer Society">American Cancer Society</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-127" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-127">[127]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-128" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-128">[128]</a></sup>
</p><p>A 2008 <i><a href="/wiki/Eye_Weekly" title="Eye Weekly">Eye Weekly</a></i> article reported that "Leone does her best to maintain a link to Sikh traditions, even if more in theory than in practice. But she's unlikely to disavow her career path due to religion" and that Leone said "Girls will leave the industry claiming that they found God. Well, the fact is, God has always been with them the entire time."<sup id="cite_ref-EyeWeekly_129-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-EyeWeekly-129">[129]</a></sup> In a 2010 interview, she said "It's a community-based religion. You walk into a temple and you're greeted with the utmost respect... But, just like any religion it doesn't want you to shoot adult material. I mean, I grew up going to temple every Sunday. When my parents found out they knew my personality which was very independent. Even if they tried to stop me or tried to steer me the right way they would have lost their daughter. I'm too headstrong. And it wasn't a plan. It just happened and my career and everything just kept getting bigger and bigger."<sup id="cite_ref-Alff_12-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Alff-12">[12]</a></sup>
</p><p>In her spare time she enjoys abstract paintings, horse riding, reading, playing <i><a href="/wiki/World_of_Warcraft" title="World of Warcraft">World of Warcraft</a></i>,<sup id="cite_ref-PNN_130-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PNN-130">[130]</a></sup> watching <i><a href="/wiki/The_Simpsons" title="The Simpsons">The Simpsons</a></i> and the <a href="/wiki/Discovery_Channel" title="Discovery Channel">Discovery Channel</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-asianclub_131-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-asianclub-131">[131]</a></sup> She used to play on a women's soccer league team in California.<sup id="cite_ref-avn_9-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-avn-9">[9]</a></sup> Her favourite holiday destination is Hawaii,<sup id="cite_ref-xrent_15-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-xrent-15">[15]</a></sup> and her favourite cuisine is Italian.<sup id="cite_ref-asianclub_131-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-asianclub-131">[131]</a></sup>
</p>

<td> 2007
</td>
<td> <i><a href="/w/index.php?title=Pocket_Pool&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Pocket Pool (page does not exist)">Pocket Pool</a></i>
</td>
<td> <i><a href="/wiki/List_of_Penthouse_Pets" title="List of Penthouse Pets">Penthouse Pet</a></i>
</td>
<th scope="row"> <a href="/wiki/PlayStation_Portable" title="PlayStation Portable">PlayStation Portable</a> game
</th>
<td>
</td></tr></table>
